arts.ttl: RB Leipzig left re-cycling old talking points after latest limp league defeat
arts.sum: RB Leipzig sporting director Marcel Schäfer and attacker Christoph Baumgartner once again found themselves searching for the right words after the latest league set-back.

arts.ttl: Alassane Pléa powers Borussia Mönchengladbach to key win over Leipzig in European race
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach edged RB Leipzig 1-0 in a tense Bundesliga clash, with Alassane Pléa's second-half strike lifting the hosts European qualification chances. Alassane Pléa of Borussia Mönchengladbach holds off Willi Orbán of RB Leipzig, demonstrating his crucial role in Gladbach's victory.

arts.ttl: Report: Benjamin Sesko future decided, transfer imminent following season
arts.sum: Benjamin Sesko has reportedly decided to leave RB Leipzig at the end of the current season. The 21-year-old has been extensively linked with a move to the Premier League and this development will no doubt be a boost to the interested clubs. The forward has been a standout performer for Leipzig this season, netting 17 […] The post Report: Benjamin Sesko future decided, transfer imminent following season appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Benjamin Sesko decides preferred transfer destination amid Arsenal, Chelsea & Man Utd interest
arts.sum: RB Leipzig striker Benjamin Sesko decides his preferred transfer destination amid interest from Arsenal, Chelsea and Manchester United.

arts.ttl: Benjamin Sesko's Premier League transfer stance 'becomes clear' amid Arsenal, Man United interest
arts.sum: RB Leipzig forward Benjamin Sesko is reportedly favouring a move to the Premier League amid interest from Arsenal and Manchester United.

arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Leipzig want Jobe Bellingham amid links to Chelsea and others
arts.sum: RB Leipzig have made contact for Sunderland midfielder Jobe Bellingham, while Tottenham Hotspur are at the front of the queue for Lille midfielder Angel Gomes . Several clubs across Europe are believed to be keen on the 24-year-old, who is set to become a free agent in the summer, and rejected a pre-contract agreement offer from West Ham. Scouts from Spurs are reported to have watched him on multiple occasions, with manager Ange Postecoglou seeing him as an ideal fit for his system.

arts.ttl: Xavi Simons to Man Utd: Transfer TRUTH revealed as €80m deal eyed
arts.sum: Xavi Simons to Man Utd: Transfer TRUTH revealed as €80m deal eyed Man Utd are one of the sides heavily linked with a summer move for Simons, but the prospect of a deal has always looked outlandish due to Leipzig likely demanding a fee in the region of €80m.

arts.ttl: Leipzig's chances of keeping Sesko "very slim"
arts.sum: Benjamin Sesko is reportedly leaning towards leaving RB Leipzig at the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach v RB Leipzig preview: Under-fire Rose returns to Borussia Park
arts.sum: Marco Rose had a very successful debut season at Borussia Park before it all ended in agony when he joined Borussia Dortmund in 2021. Under pressure at Leipzig, the Austrian coach will aim for three points from a trip to a familiar ground.

arts.ttl: The chances of Benjamin Seško staying at RB Leipzig next season are very slim
arts.sum: Bild reports that the chances of Benjamin Seško staying at RB Leipzig for another season are very slim as all signs point towards an exit. Seško has a release clause in…
